TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TcpListener extends System.Object

summary.span: 接聽 TCP 網路用戶端的連接。

span.span: Listens for connections from TCP network clients.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供簡單的方法，接聽和接受連入連線要求，在封鎖同步模式。The class provides simple methods that listen for and accept incoming connection requests in blocking synchronous mode. 您可以使用或是互相交流。You can use either a or a to connect with a . 建立使用，本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼或只是一個連接埠號碼。Create a using an , a Local IP address and port number, or just a port number. 指定本機 IP 位址和本機連接埠號碼，如果您想要將這些值指派為您的基礎服務提供者為 0。Specify for the local IP address and 0 for the local port number if you want the underlying service provider to assign those values for you. 如果您選擇這樣做，您可以使用屬性來識別已指派的資訊之後已連線的通訊端。If you choose to do this, you can use the property to identify the assigned information, after the socket has connected. 使用以開始接聽連入連線要求的方法。Use the method to begin listening for incoming connection requests. 將佇列的連入連線，直到您呼叫方法，或它已經排入佇列。 will queue incoming connections until you either call the method or it has queued . 使用任何一種或提取從內送連接要求佇列的連線。Use either or to pull a connection from the incoming connection request queue. 這兩種方法將會封鎖。These two methods will block. 如果您想要避免封鎖，您可以使用第一次，以判斷是否連接要求佇列中可用的方法。If you want to avoid blocking, you can use the method first to determine if connection requests are available in the queue. 呼叫方法以關閉。Call the method to close the . > [!NOTE] > 方法不會關閉任何已接受的連線。The method does not close any accepted connections. 您有責任個別關閉這些項目。You are responsible for closing these separately. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立。The following code example creates a . [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/CPP/tcpserver.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/CS/tcpserver.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/VB/tcpserver.vb#1)] 請參閱如用戶端的範例。See for a client example.

permission.span: 若要建立傳出連線，或接受連入要求。

span.span: to establish an outgoing connection or accept an incoming request.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

System.Obsolete("This method has been deprecated. Please use TcpListener(IPAddress localaddr, int port) instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

param.name: port
param.span: 通訊埠，將會在此處接聽連入的連接嘗試。

span.span: The port on which to listen for incoming connection attempts.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體包含指定的設計工具。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that listens on the specified port.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式已經過時。This constructor is obsolete. 使用或建構函式。Use the or constructors. 這個建構函式可讓您指定要接聽連入連線嘗試的連接埠號碼。This constructor allows you to specify the port number on which to listen for incoming connection attempts. 使用這個建構函式，基礎的服務提供者會指派最適當的網路位址。With this constructor, the underlying service provider assigns the most appropriate network address. 如果您並不在意哪些本機連接埠，您可以指定連接埠號碼 0。If you do not care which local port is used, you can specify 0 for the port number. 在此情況下，服務提供者會指派可用的暫時連接埠號碼。In this case, the service provider will assign an available ephemeral port number. 如果您使用此方法時，您可以探索哪些本機網路位址和連接埠號碼已被指派使用屬性。If you use this approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by using the property. 呼叫以開始接聽連入連線嘗試的方法。Call the method to begin listening for incoming connection attempts. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立使用本機連接埠號碼。The following code example creates a using a local port number. [!code-cpp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Net.IPEndPoint localEP) cil managed

param.name: localEP
param.span: ，表示接聽項 (Listener) 所要繫結至的本機端點。

span.span: An that represents the local endpoint to which to bind the listener .

summary.span: 使用指定的本機端點，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified local endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式可讓您指定的本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼上接聽連入連線嘗試。This constructor allows you to specify the local IP address and port number on which to listen for incoming connection attempts. 之前使用這個建構函式，您必須建立使用所需的本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。Before using this constructor, you must create an using the desired local IP address and port number. 傳遞這做為建構函式`localEP`參數。Pass this to the constructor as the `localEP` parameter. 如果您並不在意指派的本機位址，您可以建立使用位址參數，以及基礎的服務提供者會指派最適當的網路位址。If you do not care which local address is assigned, you can create an using as the address parameter, and the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate network address. 這有助於簡化您的應用程式，如果您有多個網路介面。This might help simplify your application if you have multiple network interfaces. 如果您並不在意哪些本機連接埠，您可以建立使用 0 連接埠號碼。If you do not care which local port is used, you can create an using 0 for the port number. 在此情況下，服務提供者會指派可用的暫時連接埠號碼。In this case, the service provider will assign an available ephemeral port number. 如果您使用此方法時，您可以探索哪些本機網路位址和連接埠號碼已被指派使用屬性。If you use this approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by using the property. 呼叫以開始接聽連入連線嘗試的方法。Call the method to begin listening for incoming connection attempts. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例建立的執行個體類別使用的本機端點。The following code example creates an instance of the class using the local endpoint. [!code-cpp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體會在指定的本機 IP 位址和通訊埠編號上接聽連入的連接嘗試。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that listens for incoming connection attempts on the specified local IP address and port number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式可讓您指定的本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼上接聽連入連線嘗試。This constructor allows you to specify the local IP address and port number on which to listen for incoming connection attempts. 呼叫這個建構函式之前您必須先建立使用所需的本機位址。Before calling this constructor you must first create an using the desired local address. 傳遞這做為建構函式`localaddr`參數。Pass this to the constructor as the `localaddr` parameter. 如果您並不在意指派的本機位址，指定針對`localaddr`參數，基礎的服務提供者會將指派的最適當的網路位址。If you do not care which local address is assigned, specify for the `localaddr` parameter, and the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate network address. 這有助於簡化您的應用程式，如果您有多個網路介面。This might help simplify your application if you have multiple network interfaces. 如果您並不在意哪些本機連接埠，您可以指定連接埠號碼 0。If you do not care which local port is used, you can specify 0 for the port number. 在此情況下，服務提供者會指派可用的通訊埠編號介於 1024年到 5000 之間。In this case, the service provider will assign an available port number between 1024 and 5000. 如果您使用此方法時，您可以探索哪些本機網路位址和連接埠號碼已被指派使用屬性。If you use this approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by using the property. 呼叫以開始接聽連入連線嘗試的方法。Call the method to begin listening for incoming connection attempts. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例建立的執行個體類別使用本機的 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。The following code example creates an instance of the class using a local IP address and port number. [!code-cpp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Net.Sockets.Socket AcceptSocket() cil managed

summary.span: 接受暫止連接要求。

span.span: Accepts a pending connection request.

returns.span: 用來傳送和接收資料的 。

span.span: A used to send and receive data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已封鎖的方法會傳回可用來傳送和接收資料。 is a blocking method that returns a that you can use to send and receive data. 如果您想要避免封鎖，使用方法，以判斷是否傳入的連線佇列中可用的連線要求。If you want to avoid blocking, use the method to determine if connection requests are available in the incoming connection queue. 傳回初始化與遠端主機的 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。The returned is initialized with the IP address and port number of the remote host. 您可以使用任一並方法，可通訊與遠端主機的類別。You can use any of the and methods available in the class to communicate with the remote host. 完畢時使用，務必呼叫其方法。When you are finished using the , be sure to call its method. 如果您的應用程式相當簡單，請考慮使用方法而非方法。If your application is relatively simple, consider using the method rather than the method. 為您提供簡單的方法來傳送和接收資料，透過網路以封鎖同步模式。 provides you with simple methods for sending and receiving data over a network in blocking synchronous mode. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 在下列程式碼範例中，方法用來傳回。In the following code example, the method is used to return a . 這用來與新連線的用戶端通訊。This is used to communicate with the newly connected client. [!code-cpp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Net.Sockets.Socket> AcceptSocketAsync() cil managed
Public Function AcceptSocketAsync () As Task(Of Socket)

summary.span: 以非同步作業的方式接受暫止連接要求。

span.span: Accepts a pending connection request as an asynchronous operation.
Returns

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件上的 屬性會傳回用來傳送和接收資料的 。

span.span: The property on the task object returns a used to send and receive data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回已接受通訊端連線之後，物件會完成。The returned object will complete after the socket connection has been accepted. 中傳回初始化與遠端主機的 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。The returned in is initialized with the IP address and port number of the remote host. 您可以使用任一並方法，可通訊與遠端主機的類別。You can use any of the and methods available in the class to communicate with the remote host. 完畢時使用，務必呼叫其方法。When you are finished using the , be sure to call its method. 如果您的應用程式相當簡單，請考慮使用方法而非方法。If your application is relatively simple, consider using the method rather than the method. 為您提供簡單的方法來傳送和接收資料，透過網路以封鎖同步模式。 provides you with simple methods for sending and receiving data over a network in blocking synchronous mode. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

exception.span: 尚未以呼叫 來啟動接聽項。

span.span: The listener has not been started with a call to .

summary.span: 取得值，指出 是否正在接聽用戶端連接。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether is actively listening for client connections.

value.span: 如果 正在接聽則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if is actively listening; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自可以使用這個屬性來判斷如果目前正在接聽連入連線嘗試。Classes deriving from can use this property to determine if the is currently listening for incoming connection attempts. 屬性可用來避免備援嘗試。The property can be used to avoid redundant attempts.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AllowNatTraversal(bool allowed) cil managed

param.name: allowed
param.span: 布林值，指定是否啟用或停用 NAT 周遊。

span.span: A Boolean value that specifies whether to enable or disable NAT traversal.

summary.span: 啟用或停用在 執行個體上的網路位址轉譯 (NAT) 周遊。

span.span: Enables or disables Network Address Translation (NAT) traversal on a instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來啟用或停用 NAT 周遊執行個體。The method is used to enable or disable NAT traversal for a instance. 您可以使用 Teredo，6to4 或 ISATAP 通道提供 NAT 周遊。NAT traversal may be provided using Teredo, 6to4, or an ISATAP tunnel. 當`allowed`參數為 false，相關聯的通訊端上的選項設定為。When the `allowed` parameter is false, the option on the associated socket is set to . 此明確停用 NAT 周遊執行個體。This explicitly disables NAT traversal for a instance. 當`allowed`參數為 true，相關聯的通訊端上的選項設定為。When the `allowed` parameter is true, the option on the associated socket is set to . 這可能會讓 NAT 周遊根據就地的系統上的防火牆規則。This may allow NAT traversal for a depending on firewall rules in place on the system. 必須叫用方法，才能呼叫方法，以開始接聽連入連線要求 （之前繫結的通訊端）。The method must be invoked prior to calling the method to begin listening for incoming connection requests (before the socket is bound). 如果方法之後呼叫方法，則就會擲回。If method is called after the method, then an will be thrown. Teredo 位址是 IPv6 位址首碼為 2001年:: / 32。A Teredo address is an IPv6 address with the prefix of 2001::/32. Teredo 位址可以是透過一般的 DNS 名稱解析傳回或列舉為 IPv6 位址指派給本機介面。Teredo addresses can be returned through normal DNS name resolution or enumerated as an IPv6 address assigned to a local interface.

exception.span: 已在呼叫 方法之後呼叫 方法

span.span: The method was called after calling the method

param.span: 使用者定義物件，包含接受作業資訊。

span.span: This object is passed to the callback delegate when the operation is complete.

summary.span: 開始非同步作業以接受連入的連接嘗試。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to accept an incoming connection attempt.
An that references the asynchronous creation of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非同步作業必須完成呼叫方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，會叫用方法`callback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `callback` delegate. 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。This method does not block until the operation completes. 若要封鎖，直到作業完成為止，使用方法。To block until the operation completes, use the method. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). > [!NOTE] > 您可以呼叫屬性傳回之來識別遠端主機的網路位址和連接埠號碼。You can call the property of the returned to identify the remote host's network address and port number. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性取得特定的錯誤碼，並參閱 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤碼文件位於 MSDN library，以[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/)詳細的錯誤的描述。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/) for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法來建立並與通訊端連接。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to create and connect a socket. 回呼委派呼叫方法以結束非同步要求。The callback delegate calls the method to end the asynchronous request. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/cpp/tcpserver.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/CS/tcpserver.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/VB/tcpserver.vb#4)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，其指定 是否只允許一個基礎通訊端接聽特定的通訊埠。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the allows only one underlying socket to listen to a specific port.

value.span: 如果 只允許一個 接聽特定的通訊埠，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the allows only one to listen to a specific port; otherwise, .

value.span: 若為 Windows Server 2003 和 Windows XP Service Pack 2 (含) 以後版本，則預設值為 ；若為所有其他版本，則為 。

span.span: The default is for Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP Service Pack 2 and later, and for all other versions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，多個接聽程式可以接聽特定通訊埠。By default, multiple listeners can listen to a specific port. 不過，只有其中一個接聽程式可以執行網路流量傳送至連接埠的作業。However, only one of the listeners can perform operations on the network traffic sent to the port. 如果多個接聽程式會嘗試繫結到特定的連接埠，則具有更特定的 IP 位址會處理傳送到該連接埠的網路流量。If more than one listener attempts to bind to a particular port, then the one with the more specific IP address handles the network traffic sent to that port. 您可以使用以防止多個接聽程式接聽特定連接埠的屬性。You can use the property to prevent multiple listeners from listening to a specific port. 設定這個屬性，然後再呼叫，或呼叫方法，然後設定此屬性。Set this property before calling , or call the method and then set this property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會取得並設定屬性。The following code example gets and sets the property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/cpp/tcpserver.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/CS/tcpserver.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/VB/tcpserver.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來識別要用來進行的通訊端連線之後，接聽內送的用戶端連接要求，區域網路介面和連接埠號碼。You can use the property to identify the local network interface and port number being used to listen for incoming client connection requests, after a socket connection has been made. 您必須先將此轉型至。You must first cast this to an . 您可以接著呼叫屬性，以擷取本機的 IP 位址，而屬性，以擷取本機連接埠號碼。You can then call the property to retrieve the local IP address, and the property to retrieve the local port number. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示在其上的本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼接聽內送連接要求。The following code example displays the local IP address and port number on which the is listening for incoming connection requests. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Pending() cil managed

summary.span: 決定是否有暫止連接要求存在。

span.span: Determines if there are pending connection requests.

returns.span: 如果連接為暫止，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if connections are pending; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此非封鎖性的方法會判斷是否有任何暫止連接要求。This non-blocking method determines if there are any pending connection requests. 因為並方法會封鎖執行，直到方法已排入佇列的連入連線要求，方法可用來判斷連線是否可用，然後再嘗試接受這些條款。Because the and methods block execution until the method has queued an incoming connection request, the method can be used to determine if connections are available before attempting to accept them. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查方法。The following code example checks the method. 如果連線要求正在等待被接受，然後呼叫方法。If a connection request is waiting to be accepted, then a call to the method is made. [!code-cpp[TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立來接聽內送的用戶端連接要求。 creates a to listen for incoming client connection requests. 類別衍生自可以使用這個屬性來取得此。Classes deriving from can use this property to get this . 使用基礎所傳回屬性，如果您需要存取超過其提供。Use the underlying returned by the property if you require access beyond that which provides. > [!NOTE] > 屬性只會傳回用來接聽內送的用戶端連接要求。The property only returns the used to listen for incoming client connection requests. 使用方法以接受暫止連接要求，並取得來傳送和接收資料。Use the method to accept a pending connection request and obtain a for sending and receiving data. 您也可以使用方法以接受暫止連接要求，並取得來傳送和接收資料。You can also use the method to accept a pending connection request and obtain a for sending and receiving data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 基礎會擷取並選項設定的逾時時間在 10 秒後如果資料仍然會保留在的網路緩衝區之後關閉連接。The underlying is retrieved and the option is configured to time out after 10 seconds if data still remains in the network buffer after the connection is closed. [!code-csharp[TcpListenerProtectedMembers1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListenerProtectedMembers1/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TcpListenerProtectedMembers1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListenerProtectedMembers1/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 啟動對輸入連接要求的接聽。

span.span: Starts listening for incoming connection requests.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Start() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 啟動對輸入連接要求的接聽。

span.span: Starts listening for incoming connection requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會初始化基礎、 將它的本機端點，繫結和接聽連入連線嘗試。The method initializes the underlying , binds it to a local endpoint, and listens for incoming connection attempts. 如果收到連線要求，則方法會要求排入佇列，並繼續接聽其他要求，直到您呼叫方法。If a connection request is received, the method will queue the request and continue listening for additional requests until you call the method. 如果收到連接要求它有已排入佇列的連線數目上限之後，就會擲回用戶端上。If receives a connection request after it has already queued the maximum number of connections, it will throw a on the client. 若要移除的連入連線佇列中的連線，請使用方法或方法。To remove a connection from the incoming connection queue, use either the method or the method. 方法會從佇列移除的連線，並傳回可用來傳送和接收資料。The method will remove a connection from the queue and return a that you can use to send and receive data. 方法會傳回可用來執行相同的動作。The method will return a that you can use to do the same. 如果您的應用程式只需要同步 I/O，請使用。If your application only requires synchronous I/O, use . 如需詳細行為的控制項時，使用。For more detailed behavioral control, use . 這兩種方法會封鎖直到佇列中的連線要求為止。Both of these methods block until a connection request is available in the queue. 使用方法以關閉並停止接聽。Use the method to close the and stop listening. 您必須負責個別關閉已接受的連接。You are responsible for closing your accepted connections separately. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何用來接聽內送的用戶端連線嘗試。The following code example demonstrates how is used to listen for incoming client connection attempts. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/cpp/tcpserver.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/CS/tcpserver.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/VB/tcpserver.vb#3)]

param.span: 暫止連接佇列的最大長度。

span.span: The maximum length of the pending connections queue.

summary.span: 啟動對含有最大數目暫止連接之連入連接要求的接聽。

span.span: Starts listening for incoming connection requests with a maximum number of pending connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會初始化基礎、 將它的本機端點，繫結和接聽連入連線嘗試。The method initializes the underlying , binds it to a local endpoint, and listens for incoming connection attempts. 如果收到連線要求，則將會排入佇列的要求，並繼續接聽其他要求，直到您呼叫方法。If a connection request is received, will queue the request and continue listening for additional requests until you call the method. 如果收到連接要求時，它有已排入佇列的則會擲回的連線數目上限之後用戶端上。If receives a connection request after it has already queued the maximum number of connections it will throw a on the client. 若要移除的連入連線佇列中的連線，請使用方法或方法。To remove a connection from the incoming connection queue, use either the method or the method. 方法會從佇列移除的連線，並傳回可用來傳送和接收資料。The method will remove a connection from the queue and return a that you can use to send and receive data. 方法會傳回可用來執行相同的動作。The method will return a that you can use to do the same. 如果您的應用程式只需要同步 I/O，請使用。If your application only requires synchronous I/O, use the . 如需詳細行為的控制項時，使用方法。For more detailed behavioral control, use method. 這兩種方法會封鎖直到佇列中的連線要求為止。Both of these methods block until a connection request is available in the queue. 使用方法以關閉並停止接聽。Use the method to close the and stop listening. 您必須負責個別關閉已接受的連接。You are responsible for closing your accepted connections separately. > [!NOTE] > 使用屬性取得特定的錯誤碼，並參閱 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤碼文件位於 MSDN library，以[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/)如需詳細的錯誤描述。Use the property to obtain the specific error code and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/) for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何用來接聽內送的用戶端連線嘗試。The following code example demonstrates how is MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉接聽程式。

span.span: Closes the listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 關閉接聽程式。 closes the listener. 在佇列中的任何不被接受的連線要求都將遺失。Any unaccepted connection requests in the queue will be lost. 接受遠端主機等候連接將會擲回。Remote hosts waiting for a connection to be accepted will throw a . 您必須負責個別關閉已接受的連接。You are responsible for closing your accepted connections separately. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法以關閉基礎。The following code example demonstrates using the method to close the underlying . [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/CPP/tcpserver.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/CS/tcpserver.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/VB/tcpserver.vb#1)]
